a state in the central US, whose capital city is Lincoln: He was a farmer in central Nebraska. I decided Nebraska was the place I would be.
More examplesFewer examplesIn some parts of Nebraska 40 mile an hour winds are reported.If businesses are to grow and expand in Nebraska, we need to provide them with a skilled workforce.
